text: Kazimierz Marcinkiewicz () (born 20 December 1959) is a Polish conservative politician. He was Prime Minister of Poland from 31 October 2005 to 14 July 2006. He was a member of the Law and Justice party (Prawo i Sprawiedliwość, PiS). ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Poland Category:Mayors of Warsaw
title: Kazimierz Marcinkiewicz
